name: welcome_email
title: Welcome to the Platform!
body: Hello {{userName}}, welcome to our platform. Your account has been created.

name: assessment_due_email
title: Assessment Due Soon
body: Hi {{userName}}, your assessment '{{assessmentTitle}}' is due on {{dueDate}}.

name: new_course_email
title: New Course Available
body: Hi {{userName}}, a new course '{{courseTitle}}' is now available.

name: submission_feedback_email
title: Feedback on Submission
body: Hi {{userName}}, feedback is available for your submission.

name: weekly_summary_email
title: Weekly Summary
body: Hi {{userName}}, you completed {{completed}}/{{total}} tasks this week.

name: account_verified_email
title: Account Verified
body: Your account has been successfully verified.

name: certificate_earned_email
title: Certificate Earned!
body: Congratulations {{userName}}! You earned a certificate for '{{courseTitle}}'.
